patthana3.11:1.1.pli: Noupādānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:4.1.pli: Upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno akusalo ca noupādāno akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.11:5.1.pli: Noupādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:6.1.pli: Upādānaṃ akusalañca noupādānaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:7.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:8.1.pli: Noupādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:9.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.11:10.1.pli: Upādāno akusalo dhammo upādānassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:11.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (noupādānamūlake tīṇi, sahajātādhipati), anantare nava …pe… nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi (noupādānamūlake), āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:12.1.pli: Noupādānaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:13.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:15.1.pli: Upādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.11:16.1.pli: Anupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:17.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyalokuttaradukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.11:18.1.pli: Upādāniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:19.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:21.1.pli: Upādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.11:22.1.pli: Anupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo abyākato ca anupādāniyo abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.11:23.1.pli: Upādāniyaṃ abyākatañca anupādāniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:24.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.11:25.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:26.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:28.1.pli: Upādānasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:29.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.

patthana3.11:30.1.pli: Upādānasampayuttaṃ akusalañca upādānavippayuttaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:31.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha (sabbattha cha), avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:32.1.pli: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā cha …pe… nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, navippayutte cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.11:33.1.pli: Upādānasampayutto akusalo dhammo upādānasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:34.1.pli: Upādānavippayutto akusalo dhammo upādānavippayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … dve.

patthana3.11:35.1.pli: Upādānasampayutto akusalo ca upādānavippayutto akusalo ca dhammā upādānasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:36.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (upādānasampayuttamūlake tīṇi, sahajātādhipati, upādānavippayutte ekaṃ), anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte cha, aññamaññe cha, nissaye cha, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri, āhāre cattāri, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, atthiyā cha, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:37.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:38.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:40.1.pli: Upādāniyañceva no ca upādānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo ceva no ca upādāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:41.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:43.1.pli: Upādānañceva upādāniyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ceva upādāniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:44.1.pli: Upādāniyañceva no ca upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo ceva no ca upādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:45.1.pli: Upādānañceva upādāniyaṃ akusalañca upādāniyañceva no ca upādānaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ceva upādāniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:46.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Imaṃ gamanaṃ upādānadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.11:47.1.pli: Upādāniyañceva no ca upādānaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāniyo ceva no ca upādāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:48.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:50.1.pli: Upādānañceva upādānasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ceva upādānasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:51.1.pli: Upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānasampayutto ceva no ca upādāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:52.1.pli: Upādānañceva upādānasampayuttaṃ akusalañca upādānasampayuttañceva no ca upādānaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādāno ceva upādānasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:53.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Imaṃ gamanaṃ upādānadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Idha pana hetupaccayā idaṃ nānaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha nava.)

patthana3.11:54.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ upādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto upādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.11:55.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ anupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto anupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:56.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.11:57.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ upādāniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto upādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana3.11:58.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ upādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto upādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.11:59.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ anupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto anupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.11:60.1.pli: Upādānavippayuttaṃ upādāniyaṃ abyākatañca upādānavippayuttaṃ anupādāniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca upādānavippayutto upādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.11:61.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.12:1.1.pli: Nokilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:2.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:4.1.pli: Kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:5.1.pli: Nokilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:6.1.pli: Kilesaṃ akusalañca nokilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:7.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:8.1.pli: Kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccaṃ paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana3.12:9.1.pli: Nokilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana3.12:10.1.pli: Kilesaṃ akusalañca nokilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca uddhaccañca paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:11.1.pli: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ, sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)

patthana3.12:12.1.pli: Kileso akusalo dhammo kilesassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:13.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tīṇi sahajātādhipati), anantare nava, samanantare nava …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:14.1.pli: Nokilesaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:15.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:17.1.pli: Saṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.12:18.1.pli: Asaṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:19.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.12:20.1.pli: Saṅkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:21.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:23.1.pli: Saṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.12:24.1.pli: Asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:25.1.pli: Saṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:26.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.12:27.1.pli: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:28.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:30.1.pli: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:31.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:33.1.pli: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:34.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:36.1.pli: Kilesavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:37.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:39.1.pli: Kilesasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:40.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:42.1.pli: Kilesavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:43.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:45.1.pli: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:46.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:48.1.pli: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:49.1.pli: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:50.1.pli: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikaṃ akusalañca saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:51.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ, kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.12:52.1.pli: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:53.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:55.1.pli: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:56.1.pli: Saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:57.1.pli: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalañca saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:58.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.12:59.1.pli: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:60.1.pli: Kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:61.1.pli: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttaṃ akusalañca kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:62.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.12:63.1.pli: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.12:64.1.pli: Kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:65.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana3.12:66.1.pli: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.12:67.1.pli: Kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana3.12:68.1.pli: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana3.12:69.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
